Events

                    
                    Take part.                 
            
        
    
    

We are running a weekly seminar in Cambridge, hold regular team meetings, and give talks all around the globe.

Our next big event will be on The Human Mind Conference, 27-29 June 2017 in Cambridge, coorganised with The Human Mind Project, School of Advanced Study, London.
